scripts.init-be-unix: workon quill && pip install -r requirements.txt && psql -d postgres -a -f setup.sql && python3 manage.py makemigrations && python3 manage.py migrate
scripts.start-fe: workon quill && cd quill-fe && npm install && npm dev
scripts.start-be-unix: workon quill && pip install -r requirements.txt && python3 manage.py makemigrations && python3 manage.py migrate && python3 manage.py runserver
scripts.fe-tests: workon quill && cd quill-fe && npm run test
